home.name: I'm Iveth
about.title: ABOUT ME
about.p1: Being passionate about programming since I was young led me to pursue learning about technologies to thrive in the IT world.
about.p2: While studying Computer Science at university, my life took an unexpected turn, leading me to stray away from my dream for a while. I explored unrelated work environments outside the IT world, diverse fields where I met people from whom I learned a great deal, both professionally and personally. This experience led me to develop many of my skills, such as efficient problem-solving, discipline, and resilience, to name a few. I encountered obstacles that I efficiently and satisfactorily resolved to achieve my goals and those of the companies I worked for. I would love to tell you more about this in an interview.
about.p3: Now, after investing time and effort to get back on track and through self-directed projects, I have become a valuable candidate to be part of your development team.
profile.edu3: Responsive web design / javascript / front end libraries
profile.Hb4: Spend time with family and friends

blog.pMain: This text would be a single-line introduction
blog.p1: Die Verwendung von Lorem Ipsum als Platzhaltertext ist in der Grafik- und Webdesignbranche weit verbreitet. Es hilft Designern und Entwicklern, eine Vorstellung davon zu bekommen, wie der endgültige Text in einem bestimmten Layout aussehen würde.
